item.title: "Free" web hosting services are not free [journal]
item.description: Lately I've been witnessing how Neocities is slowly falling apart, with Kyle only occasionally chiming in to solve only the most egregious and pressing technical issues and I have some thoughts on the matter...

item.title: Animating details HTML element with pure CSS (without calc-size(auto)) [guide]
item.description: I needed some ingenious solution to pretty-up my details element styling. This guide is a temporary workaround until the calc-size() CSS function becomes widely available.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I finally added a guestbook! Honestly, it took me so long because I am very particular regarding the features I am looking for in such a service. I also hate relying on 3rd party services, but I am too lazy to figure out how to code my own solution. Self-hosting my own guestbooks is still something I am considering doing at some point, so consider this Atabook-powered guestbook a temporary solution. I will probably move web hosts by that point though.

item.title: Website update

item.title: 100 Questions for Webmasters [journal]
item.description: A fun questionaire I found, made by mouseling. I was itching to write something lately and this is a perfect way to warm up my writing muscles. Warning for brutal honesty ahead.

item.title: Censorship is bad, actually [journal]
item.description: I usually prefer to avoid talking about hot-button political issues and controversial topics, but in light of recent events I decided to share my thoughts on the matter because it's closely related to my work and art as a whole.
